Description: Detects adversaries using Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) to remotely execute processes across multiple endpoints, with specific focus on embedded credential exposure in command lines. This detection correlates preceding credential access activity (LSASS access, SMB admin share writes) with subsequent execution indicators (PsExec service creation, Windows Temp directory execution) to identify complete ransomware attack chains. Observed in INC and Lynx ransomware campaigns where operators stage payloads via WMI before mass encryption. The detection identifies attack chain phases including Staging, Lateral Movement, Execution, and Full Attack Chain based on correlated activity patterns.
Detection Name: Endpoint - WMI Remote Process Creation with Credential Exposure and Attack Chain Correlation
Objective: Identify WMI-based lateral movement with credential exposure that precedes ransomware deployment, enabling early intervention before encryption begins by correlating preceding credential access with subsequent execution indicators.
Analyst Next Steps:
1. Verify WMI command legitimacy by reviewing properties.ProcessCommandLine for the /node: targets and process call create payload - determine if the source device ($device$) and user ($user$) are authorized administrators
2. Extract and document all targeted hosts from the all_targeted_hosts field and initiate containment assessment for each system - prioritize isolation if unique_wmi_targets exceeds 3 hosts
3. Check for embedded credentials in command_line by searching for /password: or /user: parameters - if found, immediately initiate password reset for exposed accounts and expand scope to all systems accessed with those credentials
4. Investigate LSASS access events (lsass_access_count) on the source device by reviewing properties.ActionType=ProcessAccess targeting lsass.exe - identify the accessing process and determine if credential dumping tools (mimikatz, lsassy, secretsdump) were used
5. Review SMB admin share activity (smb_admin_share_count) by examining connections to \\host\c$ or \\host\admin$ - identify files written via admin shares and correlate with subsequent execution on target hosts
6. Examine PsExec activity (psexec_count) for service creation events - look for PSEXESVC.exe or custom service names like winupd that indicate remote code execution following WMI staging
7. Investigate Windows Temp directory execution (temp_exe_count) by reviewing properties.FolderPath containing \\windows\\temp\\ - collect SHA256 hashes of executables for malware analysis and threat intelligence lookup
8. Correlate the attack timeline using attack_chain_start and attack_chain_end to identify the full scope of compromise - review all activity from the source device during attack_duration_mins window
9. Check for data exfiltration indicators by searching for 7z.exe, rclone.exe, or MEGAsync.exe execution on affected hosts within 24 hours before the WMI activity
10. Review for recovery inhibition attempts (vssadmin delete shadows, bcdedit /set recoveryenabled No) that may indicate imminent ransomware execution - escalate immediately if detected
11. Isolate affected systems if chain_phase equals Full_Attack_Chain or Execution_Phase and coordinate with incident response for forensic preservation before remediation
Blind_Spots_False_Positives: Blind Spots: WMI execution via PowerShell cmdlets (Invoke-WmiMethod) instead of wmic.exe; CIM-based execution (Get-CimInstance) not captured; WMI persistence via event subscriptions; obfuscated wmic.exe via renamed binaries; credential usage via Kerberos without command-line exposure. False Positives: SCCM/ConfigMgr remote management (typically without embedded credentials); enterprise management tools using WMI queries (rarely use process call create); authorized penetration testing activities. Key differentiator: Legitimate tools almost never embed plaintext /password: in command lines.
Required_Data_Sources: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint via Azure Event Hub: AdvancedHunting-DeviceProcessEvents (process execution, command lines), AdvancedHunting-DeviceNetworkEvents (SMB connections), AdvancedHunting-DeviceEvents (LSASS access, process access events)
Search String:
`azure_defender_index`
| eval event_category=case(
    'properties.FileName'="wmic.exe" AND match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\/node:.*process\s+call\s+create"), "WMI_Remote_Execution",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)ConnectionSuccess|InboundConnection") AND match('properties.RemotePort', "^(445|139)$"), "SMB_Connection",
    'properties.FileName'="PSEXESVC.exe" OR match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)psexec"), "PsExec_Activity",
    match('properties.FolderPath', "(?i)\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\") AND match('properties.FileName', "\.exe$"), "Temp_Exe_Execution",
    match('properties.ActionType', "ProcessAccess") AND 'properties.FileName'="lsass.exe", "LSASS_Access",
    1=1, "Other")
| where event_category IN ("WMI_Remote_Execution", "SMB_Connection", "PsExec_Activity", "Temp_Exe_Execution", "LSASS_Access")
| eval 
    event_time='properties.Timestamp',
    device='properties.DeviceName',
    user=coalesce('properties.AccountName', 'properties.InitiatingProcessAccountName'),
    domain=coalesce('properties.AccountDomain', 'properties.InitiatingProcessAccountDomain'),
    process_name='properties.FileName',
    command_line='properties.ProcessCommandLine',
    parent_process='properties.InitiatingProcessFileName',
    parent_cmdline='properties.InitiatingProcessCommandLine',
    file_path='properties.FolderPath',
    sha256='properties.SHA256',
    remote_ip='properties.RemoteIP',
    remote_port='properties.RemotePort',
    action_type='properties.ActionType'
| eval 
    has_embedded_creds=if(match(command_line, "(?i)\/password:"), 1, 0),
    target_nodes=if(event_category="WMI_Remote_Execution", replace(command_line, ".*\/node:\s*[\"']?([^\s\"']+)[\"']?.*", "\1"), null()),
    remote_command=if(event_category="WMI_Remote_Execution", replace(command_line, ".*process\s+call\s+create\s+[\"']?(.+?)[\"']?\s*$", "\1"), null()),
    is_admin_share=if(match(command_line, "(?i)\\\\[^\\]+\\[a-z]\$"), 1, 0),
    targets_temp_dir=if(match(command_line, "(?i)\\\\windows\\\\temp"), 1, 0),
    suspicious_service_name=if(match(command_line, "(?i)-r\s+(winupd|msiexec|svchost)"), 1, 0)
| eventstats 
    dc(target_nodes) as unique_wmi_targets,
    sum(eval(if(event_category="WMI_Remote_Execution", 1, 0))) as wmi_exec_count,
    sum(eval(if(event_category="SMB_Connection" AND is_admin_share=1, 1, 0))) as smb_admin_share_count,
    sum(eval(if(event_category="PsExec_Activity", 1, 0))) as psexec_count,
    sum(eval(if(event_category="Temp_Exe_Execution", 1, 0))) as temp_exe_count,
    sum(eval(if(event_category="LSASS_Access", 1, 0))) as lsass_access_count,
    sum(has_embedded_creds) as cred_exposure_count,
    values(target_nodes) as all_targeted_hosts,
    values(remote_command) as all_remote_commands,
    earliest(event_time) as attack_chain_start,
    latest(event_time) as attack_chain_end
    by device, user
| where wmi_exec_count > 0
| eval 
    attack_chain_indicators=mvappend(
        if(lsass_access_count > 0, "PRECEDING: LSASS credential access detected", null()),
        if(smb_admin_share_count > 0, "PRECEDING: SMB admin share writes detected", null()),
        if(cred_exposure_count > 0, "PRIMARY: Embedded credentials in WMI commands", null()),
        if(unique_wmi_targets > 1, "PRIMARY: Multi-host WMI lateral movement", null()),
        if(psexec_count > 0, "SUBSEQUENT: PsExec service execution detected", null()),
        if(temp_exe_count > 0, "SUBSEQUENT: Executable in Windows Temp directory", null())),
    chain_phase=case(
        lsass_access_count > 0 AND wmi_exec_count > 0 AND psexec_count > 0, "Full_Attack_Chain",
        wmi_exec_count > 0 AND (psexec_count > 0 OR temp_exe_count > 0), "Execution_Phase",
        (lsass_access_count > 0 OR smb_admin_share_count > 0) AND wmi_exec_count > 0, "Staging_Phase",
        wmi_exec_count > 0, "Lateral_Movement",
        1=1, "Unknown"),
    risk_score=case(
        chain_phase="Full_Attack_Chain", 100,
        cred_exposure_count > 0 AND unique_wmi_targets >= 5, 95,
        chain_phase="Execution_Phase" AND cred_exposure_count > 0, 95,
        unique_wmi_targets >= 5, 90,
        chain_phase="Staging_Phase", 85,
        cred_exposure_count > 0 AND unique_wmi_targets >= 2, 85,
        unique_wmi_targets >= 2, 80,
        cred_exposure_count > 0, 75,
        1=1, 70),
    attack_duration_mins=round((strptime(attack_chain_end, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") - strptime(attack_chain_start, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")) / 60, 1)
| where event_category="WMI_Remote_Execution"
| table 
    attack_chain_start
    attack_chain_end
    attack_duration_mins
    device
    user
    domain
    process_name
    command_line
    parent_process
    unique_wmi_targets
    all_targeted_hosts
    all_remote_commands
    cred_exposure_count
    smb_admin_share_count
    lsass_access_count
    psexec_count
    temp_exe_count
    chain_phase
    attack_chain_indicators
    risk_score
| sort - risk_score, - unique_wmi_targets
Trigger Condition: Number of results is greater than 0
Notable Title: WMI Remote Execution Attack Chain Detected - $chain_phase$ on $device$ by $user$
Notable Description: WMI remote process creation with attack chain correlation detected on $device$ by user $user$. Attack phase: $chain_phase$. Targeted $unique_wmi_targets$ unique hosts: $all_targeted_hosts$. Risk indicators: $attack_chain_indicators$. Credential exposure detected: $cred_exposure_count$. LSASS access: $lsass_access_count$. PsExec activity: $psexec_count$. Risk score: $risk_score$. Command executed: $command_line$
Proposed Test Plan: 1. Execute Atomic Red Team test T1047 (9c8ef159-c666-472f-9874-90c8d60d136b) - WMI Execute Remote Process with embedded credentials; 2. Validate detection triggers with risk_score >= 70; 3. Test multi-host targeting by executing against 3+ nodes to verify unique_wmi_targets calculation; 4. Validate attack chain correlation by combining LSASS access simulation with WMI execution; 5. Confirm PsExec correlation by following WMI staging with psexec execution
Drilldown Name 1: View Events Associated to this Notable on
Drilldown Search 2:
`azure_defender_index`
    (sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-deviceprocessevents" OR
     sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-deviceevents" OR
     sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-devicenetworkevents" OR
     sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-devicefileevents")
    (properties.DeviceName="$device$" OR properties.DeviceName IN ($all_targeted_hosts$))
| eval investigation_category=case(
    'properties.FileName'="wmic.exe" AND match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\/node:.*process\s+call\s+create"), "01_WMI_REMOTE_EXECUTION",
    match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\/password:|\/user:.*\/p:|-u\s+\S+\s+-p\s+"), "02_CREDENTIAL_EXPOSURE",
    match('properties.ActionType', "ProcessAccess") AND 'properties.FileName'="lsass.exe", "03_LSASS_CREDENTIAL_ACCESS",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)ConnectionSuccess") AND match('properties.RemotePort', "^(445|139)$"), "04_SMB_ADMIN_SHARE",
    'properties.FileName'="PSEXESVC.exe" OR match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)psexec.*(-r\s+|\\\\\\\\)"), "05_PSEXEC_SERVICE_EXECUTION",
    match('properties.FolderPath', "(?i)\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\") AND match('properties.FileName', "\.exe$"), "06_TEMP_DIRECTORY_EXECUTION",
    match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)(vssadmin.*delete|wmic.*shadowcopy|bcdedit.*recovery)"), "07_RECOVERY_INHIBITION",
    match('properties.FileName', "(?i)(7z|7za|7zG)\.exe") OR match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)rclone|megasync"), "08_EXFILTRATION_STAGING",
    match('properties.ActionType', "FileCreated|FileModified") AND match('properties.FileName', "(?i)\.(inc|lynx|encrypted)$|readme\.txt$"), "09_ENCRYPTION_ARTIFACTS",
    match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)(net\s+group|nltest|dsquery|adfind|whoami\s+\/all)"), "10_DOMAIN_RECONNAISSANCE",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)NetworkConnection") AND NOT match('properties.RemoteIP', "^(10\.|172\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[01])\.|192\.168\.|127\.)"), "11_EXTERNAL_C2_CONNECTIONS",
    1=1, "99_OTHER_ACTIVITY")
| where investigation_category!="99_OTHER_ACTIVITY"
| eval 
    event_time='properties.Timestamp',
    device=coalesce('properties.DeviceName', "Unknown"),
    user=coalesce('properties.AccountName', 'properties.InitiatingProcessAccountName', "SYSTEM"),
    process=coalesce('properties.FileName', 'properties.InitiatingProcessFileName'),
    command_line=coalesce('properties.ProcessCommandLine', 'properties.InitiatingProcessCommandLine'),
    parent_process='properties.InitiatingProcessFileName',
    file_path='properties.FolderPath',
    sha256=coalesce('properties.SHA256', 'properties.InitiatingProcessSHA256'),
    remote_ip='properties.RemoteIP',
    remote_port='properties.RemotePort',
    action_type='properties.ActionType'
| eval key_indicator=case(
    investigation_category="01_WMI_REMOTE_EXECUTION", "WMI: ".process." -> ".replace(command_line, ".*\/node:\s*[\"']?([^\s\"']+)[\"']?.*", "\1"),
    investigation_category="02_CREDENTIAL_EXPOSURE", "CREDS EXPOSED: ".user." in command line",
    investigation_category="03_LSASS_CREDENTIAL_ACCESS", "LSASS ACCESS: ".parent_process." -> lsass.exe",
    investigation_category="04_SMB_ADMIN_SHARE", "SMB: ".device." -> ".remote_ip.":".remote_port,
    investigation_category="05_PSEXEC_SERVICE_EXECUTION", "PSEXEC: ".process." service execution",
    investigation_category="06_TEMP_DIRECTORY_EXECUTION", "TEMP EXE: ".file_path.process,
    investigation_category="07_RECOVERY_INHIBITION", "RECOVERY DISABLED: ".command_line,
    investigation_category="08_EXFILTRATION_STAGING", "EXFIL TOOL: ".process,
    investigation_category="09_ENCRYPTION_ARTIFACTS", "RANSOMWARE: ".file_path.process,
    investigation_category="10_DOMAIN_RECONNAISSANCE", "RECON: ".command_line,
    investigation_category="11_EXTERNAL_C2_CONNECTIONS", "C2: ".process." -> ".remote_ip.":".remote_port,
    1=1, action_type.": ".process)
| eval investigation_priority=case(
    investigation_category IN ("01_WMI_REMOTE_EXECUTION","03_LSASS_CREDENTIAL_ACCESS","07_RECOVERY_INHIBITION","09_ENCRYPTION_ARTIFACTS"), "1_CRITICAL",
    investigation_category IN ("02_CREDENTIAL_EXPOSURE","05_PSEXEC_SERVICE_EXECUTION","06_TEMP_DIRECTORY_EXECUTION"), "2_HIGH",
    investigation_category IN ("04_SMB_ADMIN_SHARE","08_EXFILTRATION_STAGING","11_EXTERNAL_C2_CONNECTIONS"), "3_MEDIUM",
    1=1, "4_LOW")
| stats
    earliest(event_time) as first_seen,
    latest(event_time) as last_seen,
    count as event_count,
    values(key_indicator) as indicators,
    values(device) as affected_devices,
    dc(device) as unique_devices,
    values(user) as users_involved,
    values(process) as processes,
    values(command_line) as commands,
    values(sha256) as file_hashes,
    values(remote_ip) as remote_ips
    by investigation_category, investigation_priority
| eval first_seen=strftime(strptime(first_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
       last_seen=strftime(strptime(last_seen, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort investigation_priority, investigation_category
| rename
    investigation_category as "Investigation Category",
    investigation_priority as "Priority",
    first_seen as "First Seen",
    last_seen as "Last Seen",
    event_count as "Event Count",
    unique_devices as "Unique Devices",
    affected_devices as "Affected Devices",
    users_involved as "Users Involved",
    indicators as "Key Indicators",
    processes as "Processes",
    commands as "Commands",
    file_hashes as "File Hashes (SHA256)",
    remote_ips as "Remote IPs"
Drilldown Search 3:
`azure_defender_index`
    (sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-deviceprocessevents" OR
     sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-devicenetworkevents" OR
     sourcetype="mscs:azure:eventhub:defender:advancedhunting-devicelogonevents")
    (properties.AccountName="$user$" OR properties.InitiatingProcessAccountName="$user$")
| eval activity_type=case(
    'properties.FileName'="wmic.exe" AND match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\/node:"), "1_WMI_LATERAL",
    match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)psexec|paexec"), "2_PSEXEC_LATERAL",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)LogonSuccess") AND 'properties.LogonType'="10", "3_RDP_LOGON",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)LogonSuccess") AND 'properties.LogonType'="3", "4_NETWORK_LOGON",
    match('properties.ActionType', "(?i)ConnectionSuccess") AND match('properties.RemotePort', "^(445|139|135)$"), "5_SMB_RPC_CONNECTION",
    match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)(net\s+use|copy\s+\\\\\\\\|xcopy\s+\\\\\\\\)"), "6_FILE_COPY_OPERATION",
    match('properties.FileName', "(?i)(cmd|powershell|pwsh)\.exe") AND match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\\\\\\\\[^\\\\]+\\\\"), "7_REMOTE_COMMAND",
    1=1, "9_OTHER")
| where activity_type!="9_OTHER"
| eval 
    event_time='properties.Timestamp',
    source_device='properties.DeviceName',
    target_device=case(
        isnotnull('properties.RemoteIP'), 'properties.RemoteIP',
        match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\/node:\s*[\"']?([^\s\"']+)"), replace('properties.ProcessCommandLine', ".*\/node:\s*[\"']?([^\s\"']+)[\"']?.*", "\1"),
        match('properties.ProcessCommandLine', "(?i)\\\\\\\\([^\\\\]+)\\\\"), replace('properties.ProcessCommandLine', ".*\\\\\\\\([^\\\\]+)\\\\.*", "\1"),
        1=1, "local"),
    user=coalesce('properties.AccountName', 'properties.InitiatingProcessAccountName'),
    process='properties.FileName',
    command_line='properties.ProcessCommandLine',
    logon_type='properties.LogonType'
| eval lateral_indicator=source_device." -> ".target_device." [".activity_type."]"
| stats
    earliest(event_time) as first_activity,
    latest(event_time) as last_activity,
    count as activity_count,
    values(lateral_indicator) as movement_path,
    dc(target_device) as unique_targets,
    values(target_device) as all_targets,
    values(process) as tools_used,
    values(command_line) as commands
    by user, activity_type
| eval first_activity=strftime(strptime(first_activity, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
       last_activity=strftime(strptime(last_activity, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S"), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| sort activity_type
| rename
    user as "User Account",
    activity_type as "Activity Type",
    first_activity as "First Activity",
    last_activity as "Last Activity",
    activity_count as "Event Count",
    unique_targets as "Unique Targets",
    all_targets as "All Target Systems",
    movement_path as "Lateral Movement Path",
    tools_used as "Tools Used",
    commands as "Commands Executed"
